title: Rick and Morty
creator_credit: Sydney Ryan, Steve Levy, Nick Rutherford, Albro Lundy IV, Anne Lane, J. Michael Mendel, Lee Harting, Green Portal Productions, Williams Street, Harmonius Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions and Starburns Industries
brief_description: Rick is a mentally-unbalanced but scientifically gifted old man who has recently reconnected with his family. He spends most of his time involving his young grandson Morty in dangerous, outlandish adventures throughout space and alternate universes. Compounded with Morty’s already unstable family life, these events cause Morty much distress at home and school.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.
